HeroSection.description: The future of Africa: innovations, opportunities and inspirations to build a prosperous continent.

ServicesSection.title: OUR SERVICES
ServicesSection.subtitle: Grow your business
ServicesSection.description: Boost your business potential in Africa with our dedicated platform. Benefit from specialized advice, strategic resources and a network of partners to stimulate your growth in this dynamic continent. Whether you're an established business or an ambitious start-up, find here the support you need to navigate the African market effectively and realize your development ambitions.

realEstate.title: Real estate listings

jobs.title: Your career, our mission: employment.
jobs.description: With Jobs Africa, access the best job offers across Africa. Discover opportunities in booming sectors and find the job that matches your ambitions. Simple, fast, and designed for African talent!

store.title: Our official store
store.description: Together, let's build Africa's future: every purchase supports sustainable development and local impact projects.

TestimonialSection.title: TESTIMONIALS
TestimonialSection.subtitle: See what our 1,000+ clients say about us.

amina.name: Amina Diallo
amina.comment: Afrique Avenir is a true source of inspiration and information. I find new and innovative perspectives for the development of our continent there. Well done!

kwame.name: Kwame Mensah
kwame.comment: The Afrique Avenir website is fantastic! It highlights incredible initiatives and offers an optimistic vision of Africa's future. Keep up the excellent work!

fatoumata.name: Fatoumata Diop
fatoumata.comment: I'm impressed by the wealth of content on Afrique Avenir. It's an essential resource for anyone interested in Africa's evolution and progress.

tunde.name: Tunde Adebayo
tunde.comment: Afrique Avenir provides an excellent overview of development opportunities in Africa. The articles are well-written and the topics very relevant. A site to recommend!

nia.name: Nia Nkrumah
nia.comment: I love Afrique Avenir! The site offers inspiring articles and success stories that show the enormous potential of our continent. Thank you for this great platform!

lamine.name: Lamine CissÃ©
lamine.comment: Afrique Avenir is a goldmine for anyone who wants to understand the challenges and opportunities in Africa. The analyses are relevant and the proposed solutions are innovative. Congratulations!

FAQSection.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
FAQSection.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions.

item-1.question: Can you help me live in Africa?
item-1.answer: The site is entirely designed by expatriates in Africa, for expatriates. We do our best to help those who wish to live in Africa.

item-2.question: Can you help me get a visa?
item-2.answer: No. The best way to get a visa is to start by visiting the embassy or consulate of the country you're interested in.

item-3.question: Is it possible to promote my business and services on AFRIQUE AVENIR?
item-3.answer: Yes. We can offer you different local or global solutions. Feel free to contact us to learn more.

item-4.question: How to contact the team?
item-4.answer: You can use our contact form.
